getSubLogger

public static Logger getSubLogger(Logger logger,
                                  String name)
Gets a sub-logger by appending a "." to a logger's name. This allows inheritance of configuration.

Parameters:
logger - The base logger
name - The sub-logger name
Returns:
The sub-logger
